entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
